message: Hi! I have a great product for you today, priced at $100. It's a fantastic opportunity, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.  What do you say?

Thanks for the offer, but I'm not sure about this yet.  I'm a little hesitant to buy without any information on the quality of the product. Could you share some feedback from previous buyers? Or maybe offer a discount if it turns out to be low quality?
